column4: Anyone have any ideas why firefox is taking an awful long time to start sometimes? This can be for a brand new user, no extensions etc
Not an option, it's for end users
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
digitalfiz: Isnt it the linux-headers-`uname -r`thats's needed?
you could make a bash script and add that
the live one doesnt but the normal one can
they are equal if no command is entered after -s
there are a list of packages on omgubuntu to install (32bit deps) to make it run :)
Yes, I've got it running. I was just saying, people still release 32-bit only stuff these days
